Articles.Content:
"AFF Industries" present to you his awesomest spaceplane - AFF_W50.

AFF_W50 - Style.Smart. Innovative. DOWNLOAD and FLY rigt now! (download link is in album description)

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Keys

1 - engine mode switch

2 - engine ON/OFF

3 - intake OPEN/CLOSE

5 - airbrake ON/OFF

Download here http://www.datafilehost.com/d/cbf4bedb

Edited September 6, 2015 by AFF
that's a really interesting design, dude! Well done!
I don't know what this is, but I want it.

I took her for a spin. And was pleasantly surprised at just how lovely this little runaround is. I also did not realise that you could put fuel in the BigS Wing Strakes, so thank you for making me aware of this.

My only gripe, is that in space the torque reaction from the engine is more powerful than the on board reaction wheels can handle (massively so, well massively being relative..). If you haven't come across it yet you should consider adding RCS Build Aid to your mod repository. And to be really pedantic, the RCS blocks could be a bit closer to the dry CoM.

Love the look, it handles nicely and it gets to orbit with complete ease.
Excellent looking design! Farnsworth Rocket Surgery may have to steal...er...copy...um...borrow, some of the design ideas.
